FuncDef:
The export interval command configures the interval for reporting data in the packet loss visualization and latency visualization flow tables to the collector.
The undo export interval command cancels the interval configuration for reporting data in the packet loss visualization and latency visualization flow tables to the collector. The export interval command configures the interval for reporting data in the packet loss visualization and latency visualization flow tables to the collector. The undo export interval command cancels the interval configuration for reporting data in the packet loss visualization and latency visualization flow tables to the collector. By default, the interval for sending flow table data of packet loss visualization and latency visualization to the collector is 10s.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the interval for reporting data in the packet loss visualization and latency visualization flow tables to the collector.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 1800s. The default value is 10s.
